mods.abstract: Runaway in Jail. WAS committed to Jail, on the 2nd day of August, A.D., 1854, a negro man, calling himself JOHN, who says he belongs to Mrs. Antoine NÃ©zat, on Bayou Teche, near Opelousas. Said Negro is about 5 feet, 9 inches high, has a scar on his breast, aged about forty years. The owner of said slave is requested to come forward, prove property and take him away. J. H. COLE, Sheriff. Lake Charles, Parish of Calcasieu, August 19th., 1854.
